mapper.insert: insert into welding_parameters ( pqr_info_id, process, action, bead_no, electrode, electrode_size, amp_min, amp_max, volt_min, volt_max, speed_min, speed_max, heat_input_min, heat_input_max, other, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user ) values ( #{pqrInfoId}, #{process}, #{action}, #{beadNo}, #{electrode}, #{electrodeSize}, #{ampMin}, #{ampMax}, #{voltMin}, #{voltMax}, #{speedMin}, #{speedMax}, #{heatInputMin}, #{heatInputMax}, #{other}, NOW(), 0, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: select IF(COUNT(*) = 1,1,0) from welding_parameters where pqr_info_id=#{pqrInfoId}
